Title: The Way Back
Writer: Keith R. Clarke (screenplay), Slavomir Rawicz (novel), Peter Weir (screenplay)
Actors: Dragos Bucur, Colin Farrell, Ed Harris, Alexandru Potocean
Plot: Siberian gulag escapees travel 4,000 miles by foot to freedom in India.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 2 wins & 4 nominations.
